Subject: Breaking, entering, and Attempted Murder
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

A Maximal message comes over Hot Rod's comm. He reconized the voice, as
the bot he built on Cybertron. In a way, his daughter. He didn't have
time for many thoughts. Skulletron broke in, and grabbed him.
He reached his hand up, grabbing Skulletron's neck. It appeared that he
was trying to choke Skulletron, but three plasma cannons were now
against the back of skulletrons head. He fired! (There is no room for
dodging.)

::DrillBit::

He cought up with KitKat.
"Hey, whats up?"
